sentences.en: He is the one who's peddling the drugs unlawfully.
sentences.cn: 他就是那个非法贩卖毒品的人.

sentences.en: He worked as a door-to-door salesman peddling cloths and brushes.
sentences.cn: 他的工作是上门推销抹布和刷子。

sentences.en: He's the one who's peddling the drugs unlawfully.
sentences.cn: 他是个非法贩卖药品的人.

sentences.en: I do not kown who's been peddling these nasty rumours about me.
sentences.cn: 我不知道是谁在对我散播这些恶毒的谣言.

sentences.en: It is just as likely that he was a charlatan peddling hocus - pocus.
sentences.cn: 他过去恰恰很可能是个挨家挨户行骗的江湖医生.

sentences.en: More than three dozen firms are peddling products.
sentences.cn: 至少有近四十家企业在出售产品.

sentences.en: Perhaps peddling forgeries has ended up being bad for your health.
sentences.cn: 或许结束伪造品的买卖会有害于你的健康.

sentences.en: Poor Jimmie is having a hard time peddling his bonds.
sentences.cn: 可怜的吉美推销债券并不顺利.

sentences.en: She went peddling furiously up the narrow street.
sentences.cn: 她在狭窄的街道上疯狂地叫卖.

sentences.en: She went to prison for peddling drugs.
The policeman ran the man in for peddling without alicence.
sentences.cn: 警察因为这个人无证贩卖而拘捕了他.

sentences.en: The war against drug peddling is all about cash.
sentences.cn: 禁毒斗争归根到底是钱的问题。

sentences.en: They'd been notified I'd been peddling drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们在此之前得到过报告说我贩卖毒品.

sentences.en: When the cyclist stops peddling, his watt average declines dramatically!
sentences.cn: 当自行车停止贩卖, 他的瓦平均下降显着!

words.tran_cn: 叫卖的；无关紧要的；琐碎的

trans.tran_cn: 忙于琐事的，无关紧要的
（沿街）叫卖( peddle的现在分词 )，兜售，宣传，散播
